text: Anna Maria Ferrero (18 February 1934 – 21 May 2018) was an Italian actress. She was born in Rome. From 1962 until her death, Ferrero was married to Jean Sorel. She appeared with Vittorio Gassman in six movies: Lorenzaccio, King Vidor's War and Peace, Kean, which Gassman co-directed, Giovanni dalle bande nere, Le sorprese dell'amore, and Il mattatore. Ferrero was known for her roles in The Violent Patriot, Bad Girls Don't Cry, and Love and Larceny.
